name: Christmas in the Mountains
description:
Based on childhood memories, I developed this game from scratch during a 5-day period for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition game jam. All artwork and animations are original and hand-drawn, using a drawing tablet and Krita. I performed the narration, soundFX are from OpenSound, and background music is credited below.

  • Auld Lang Syne - DJ Williams
  • Deck the Halls - Kevin MacLeod
